alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Saline; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lancaster, southeastern Seward, north central Saline and southwestern Saunders Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milford, or 10 miles south of Seward, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Dale around 730 PM CDT. Garland and Emerald around 735 PM CDT. Malcolm and Lincoln Airport around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Raymond and Davey. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 377 and 405. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
